Name: Huibi
Alliance: Zhangjiang bashê (Zhangjiang eight shê ritual alliance)
Village_Settlement: Huibi is part of the Gangli Administrative Village 港利行政村. Huibi village has a population of approximately 250 people.
Surname_Groups: The Peng 彭 are the dominant surname group in the village.
Village_Temples: 1) Baoxing chansi 宝醒禅寺 is dedicated to Rulai fozu 如来佛祖.

Rituals.Yuanxiao processions: On 1/13 Fazhu xianfei 法主仙妃 is invited from the Zhaohuilong 昭灵宫 to go on procession around the Huibi village boundaries.
Rituals.Birthday celebrations of the gods: 9/3: The villagers invite Yanggong taishi 杨公太师 from the Baoquanyuan 宝泉院 to watch opera. 9/16: The celebration of the birthday of the Zunzhu mingwang 尊主 明王 and Houtu furen 后土夫人 of the Qiandong zushê 前东祖社 is held.
